EmbCol
======

Python package for embedding data points into the color space.

Installation
------------

```shell
python -m pip install embcol
```

Usage
-----

See the [Usage page](https://naubuan.gitlab.io/embcol/usage.html) of
the [documentation](https://naubuan.gitlab.io/embcol).
